P3212.ANFBackend.DAOs

Interface DAOStatsInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StatsJDBCImplementation

    public interface DAOStatsInterface
    CRUD interface for 'Stats' Uses a mapper - implementation of a RowMapper<> interface for ORM purpose

        fights - - number of fights
        wins - - number of wins
        losses - - number of losses
        deaths - number of deaths
